levelList.name: Harpoon of Obsession
levelList.desc:
Deal more damage based on target's missing HP (+0.2% damage per 1% missing HP, máx +20%)
[EndSkill] If the target is Staggered or defeated, (1+(Highest A-Reson./2)) allies with the least SP heal 10 SP, gain 2 Poise, and +4 Poise Count. (2 times máx. Máx # of allies that can be healed: 4)
